tagline: A lightweight tool that highlights risky clauses and buzzwords in contracts and ToS (in-browser, no AI).
inputDesc: Paste the full text as plain text. For PDFs or paper, run OCR yourself, verify the text, then paste. No data is sent to our servers.
disclaimer: This tool is for educational and alert purposes only. It does not provide legal advice or guarantee accuracy.
highlightDesc: Shows matched spans in your text. If it's hard to read, check the left pane too.
donationText: If this tool was helpful, you can support future updates here:
placeholder: Paste the contract / ToS text here. (Processed locally in your browser only.)
